Rivaldo Rodrigues

MSc in Computer Engineering // Software Engineer // Developer // Designer

About Myself

Geek, passionate about technology and everything new about programming, lover of a good read, aspiring writer, kung fu fighter and amateur musician at free time.

I graduated in computer engineering at UFRN and I also got a master's degree in electrical engineering and computing at the same institution.

Currently working as a developer at Logique Sistemas.
